DataElement.preferredName: Generalized Anxiety Disorder 7 Item Questionnaire Several Days Subgroup Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The sum of all responses by an individual to the "Several Days" column of the Generalized Anxiety Disorder - 7 Item Questionnaire (GAD-7).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Generalized Anxiety Disorder 7 Item Questionnaire Several Day Subgroup
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A seven item validated, self-reported questionnaire for screening, and assessing the severity of generalized anxiety disorder in clinical practice and research settings._An indefinite small quantity that is more than two but less than many._The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day._Subgroup; a distinct and often subordinate group within a group.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A standardized survey developed by Robert L. Spitzer and colleagues in 2006 which is used to identify probable cases of generalized anxiety disorder and assess the severity of an individual's symptoms. This instrument consists of 7 items and one follow-up item. Each item is rated on a scale of 0-3 where 0 is 'not at all' and 3 is 'nearly every day.'

Concepts.definition: A seven item validated, self-reported questionnaire for screening, and assessing the severity of generalized anxiety disorder in clinical practice and research settings.

The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
A subdivision of a larger group with members often exhibiting similar characteristics.
